body:
Comment 12 by **momcconville**: 
I think I found the issue (I'm not sure how I didn't previously notice this), which is
that go get installs the package under $GOPATH, but the godoc binary only looks for its
needed files under $GOROOT.

Ignore the file locations I mentioned in my first comment - they were only there because
I set GOPATH=$GOROOT/lib when I first installed go, not knowing any better.
